result.eng: The only cure for love is marriage.
result.ga: Níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadh
result.orig: Níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadh
result.html: Níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadhThe only cure for love is marriage.
result.ponchtml: Níl leiġeas ar ġrá aċ pósaḋThe only cure for love is marriage.

result.eng: This single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ga: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.orig: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadh
result.html: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósadhThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fear singil seo ag lorg bean álainn le pósaḋThis single man is looking for a pretty woman to marry.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
